00023 #ifndef _PEPTIDEID_PEPXML_HPP_
00024 #define _PEPTIDEID_PEPXML_HPP_
00025 
00026 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00027 #include <map>
00028 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "PeptideID.hpp"
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace peptideid {
00034 
00035 /// This class allows access to identified proteins in PeptideProphet files.
00036 
00037 /// A PeptideID_pepXML object is contructed with either the path to a
00038 /// PeptideProphet format file (*.pep.xml), or an std::istream open to
00039 /// the beginning of a pep.xml file.
00040 
00041 class PWIZ_API_DECL PeptideID_pepXml : public PeptideID
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     /// Constructor taking path to input file in std::string.
00045     PeptideID_pepXml(const std::string& filename);
00046 
00047     /// Constructor taking path to input file from const char*.
00048     PeptideID_pepXml(const char* filename);
00049 
00050     /// Constructor taking std::istream as input.
00051     PeptideID_pepXml(std::istream* in);
00052 
00053     /// Destructor.
00054     virtual ~PeptideID_pepXml() {}
00055 
00056     /// Returns the Record object associated with the given nativeID.
00057 
00058     /// A range_error is thrown if the nativeID isn't associated with
00059     /// a Record.
00060     virtual Record record(const std::string& nativeID) const;
00061 
00062     virtual std::multimap<double, boost::shared_ptr<PeptideID::Record> >::const_iterator
00063         record(double retention_time_sec) const;
00064     
00065 private:
00066     class Impl;
00067     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> pimpl;
00068 
00069 };
00070 
00071 } // namespace peptideid
00072 } // namespace pwiz
00073 
00074 #endif // _PEPTIDEID_PEPXML_HPP_
